name: Project Space Ace
description:
Simple prototype of a space shooter I hope to flesh out as I learn more. Controls work best with an xbox controller, as the movement is really touchy on keyboard. Never the less, the controls:

Keyboard and Mouse: WASD to move, left click to shoot, left click and hold to charge and lock on (when crosshairs turn green);

Xbox controller: Left thumbstick to move, Triggers to spin, A to shoot, hold A to charge and lock on.

Soundtrack is Long Range Combat from Ultimate Game Music Collection, by John Leonard French
